title: Environmental Protection Initiative
description: Comprehensive program focusing on terrestrial and marine protection through awareness sessions and community engagement activities.

title: Youth Leadership Development
description: Skills enhancement workshops and life skills training designed to empower young leaders for the future.

title: Health Awareness Campaign
description: Educational sessions on alcohol, drugs, smoking, and STDs prevention for community health improvement.

title: Social Welfare Support Program
description: Providing support and assistance to social welfare organizations and people with disabilities.

title: Academic Support Initiative
description: Educational activities including academic support, office organization, and public office visits for students.

title: Cultural Heritage Preservation
description: Archaeological site visits and cultural activities to preserve and promote Lebanon's rich heritage.
